queries.query: What is the No Claim Bonus for 2 consecutive claim-free years?
What is the minimum age requirement for insuring a private car?
Are add-on covers available with third party only policy?
Can a vehicle registered as a private car but used for occasional paid carpooling be insured under a standard private car policy?
If a vehicle suffers engine damage due to water ingress during monsoon but the insured continued to crank the engine, is the loss payable under own damage cover?
Are depreciation charges on replaced rubber/nylon/plastic parts covered if the vehicle is insured with a zero depreciation add-on but the claim is for malicious damage?
If the insured transfers NCB from another insurer at renewal but the previous policy had lapsed by 120 days, can the NCB percentage be carried forward?
Does the policy cover theft of accessories fitted after policy inception if they were not declared but their value is within the IDV margin?
In case of constructive total loss where the repair estimate is 76% of IDV, is the insured entitled to full IDV or repair cost minus deductible?
If the insured dies after filing a claim but before settlement, can the legal heir claim the salvage value separately from the total loss payout?
